ygData.subject: RE: Bard Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, ok, here are a few sugestions for you pettition.... Chick Stuff I d like to some one fix the fact that female pc s have more stuff given to them.  I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, ok, here are a few sugestions for you
pettition....

Chick Stuff
I'd like to some one fix the fact that female pc's
have more stuff given to them. I've been travling
with a lady wizzie friend since 5, and every week she
has a story about some new item she got super cheap or
next to nothing. I'm 24 now, and the only thing I
ever had given to me were banded sleaves.

Neural Sensors
The game needs to be able to tell when I'm asleep at
the keyboard so it can notify my party that keeps
trying to defend me.

Alpha Loot
How many times have I been in a party of Aeric, Ariel,
Aalamondi, Ashley and Almar and heard, "Well guys, I
got my super cool item, boy am I tired now, see you
guys later"

Idiot Flag
Some sort of warning for clerics who melee and
repulse, but never heal, mages who burn early that you
spend the rest of the battle trying to pull mobs off,
and neurotic pullers who insist "30% mana is fine, now
where was that level 30 evil eye?"

RL sex flag
To ID people role playing other sexes. I say this
because my guild already had it's version of the
crying game, ewwwwww
_____________________________________________________________
